alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 3:22AM EST until January 11 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Baltimore MD/Washington DC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia... Maryland... Potomac River at Edwards Ferry affecting Montgomery and Loudoun Counties. For the Potomac River...including Paw Paw, Hancock, Dam Number Five, Shepherdstown, Harpers Ferry, Point of Rocks, Edwards Ferry, Little Falls...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Potomac River at Edwards Ferry. * WHEN...From early this morning to late this morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Water reaches the boat ramp and lower parking area at Edwards Ferry, and begins to inundate areas near Whites Ferry. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:01 AM EST Thursday the stage was 14.9 feet, or 0.1 feet below flood stage. - No bankfull stage is available. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.0 feet this morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information && River Name Fld Observed Thu Thu Thu Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 7AM 1PM 7PM Stg Time Date Potomac River Edwards Ferr 15.0 14.9 Thu 3 am 15.0 14.9 14.5 15.0 7am Thu &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/washington or www.weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued this morning at 1000 AM EST.
